verses.roman:
eta bali' vidāya dila sei dui-jane
sārvabhauma dekhite āila vaiṣṇava-milane

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; vidāya dila—granted permission to go; sei dui-jane—to those two persons; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; dekhite—to see; āila—came; vaiṣṇava-milane—in the meeting of all the Vaiṣṇavas.
translation: Saying this, the King gave them permission to leave. Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya also went to see the assembly of all the Vaiṣṇavas.
